section.p: You scour the land for miles around. Eventually, you spot an owl in the air, which you tell the men to follow.
‘Why are we following an owl?’ grumbles the mate.

You explain that this particular owl makes its nest in a tree - there must be a wood nearby. Sure enough, you cross the crest of a hill to find a forest of fir trees, marching north to the Peaks at the Edge of the World. The men are able to chop enough timber to make repairs, and soon the Mermaid’s Desire is seaworthy. They elect you captain. Note the
Mermaid’s Desire
on your Ship’s Manifest. It is a barque with a capacity of 1 Cargo Unit. The ship has no cargo and the crew quality is poor.
